Positive review: Nice room for one night. Clean and cozy. The host was nice as well
Negative review:
The neighborhood wasn’t too pleasant especially when I walked to the local store. Met a couple kids that asked me for cash. 
The only thing that districted in property is poor noise cancelation. Heard everything what was behind the doors
Property reply:
Thanks for your feedback.

I am glad you enjoyed the room and found it clean and cozy.

I’m really sorry about what happened to you on your way to the shop. This area is one of the quietest and safest area in Manchester. 

I’m also sorry for the noise level. These issues have never been mentioned by other guests, but I appreciate you bringing it to my attention. I will keep an eye and ears out for it.

I strive to provide a comfortable stay for all my guests, and your comment will help me to improve. 

If you have any further suggestions or concerns, please don't hesitate to let us know. Thank you for choosing to stay at my place.

Positive review: Very good location.
Negative review: Bed to big for room.not what we thought .not how the profile was.bed held up by timber as was broken.burn mark carpet..cobwebs.2 screwheads  hanging out of wall.not what I call a luxury room.mark on duvet cover.we always strip the beds and fold up before we leave.if we had seen the state of the mattress before hand.we wudnt have stayed. Bathroom clean and tidy.but toilet seat very loose.. on exiting the property to go out you couldn't enter the property through the front door?.you had to go via back gate.through sliding doors through the livingroom.where you wud see the owner half asleep on the sofa on more than one occasion.as we had booked for 2 nights.sat night and left Sunday afternoon.thay was our choice to leave Sunday afternoon.
Property reply:
Thank you for your feedback. I'm sorry to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations. I want to remind you that the listing clearly states that this is a shared home, I live in the property and I do my best to provide a comfortable and welcoming environment for all my guests. 

The bed, while it might have seemed large for the room, is a standard size that I believe most guests would appreciate for comfort. I apologize for the maintenance issues you encountered, and I'll address them promptly.

Regarding access to the property, the listing explains that it’s a shared space and I always stay in the living room to make sure everything is ok with my guests. I understand that might not be ideal for everyone, but it's part of staying in a shared home. 

I appreciate your feedback on the cleanliness, and I’ll ensure the issues you mentioned are taken care of. Thank you for bringing these matters to my attention, and I hope your next stay meets your expectations better.

Best regards,  
Henry

Positive review: very nice clean room . good if you want to stay with family. Nice and clean toilet and location.

Review title: Not what you expect for Luxury rooms
Positive review: Pokoj s koupelnou, hezky uklizený a ochotny pan majitel.
Negative review:
Docela velký hluk z cesty a velmi hluční lidé ubytovani ve stejném domě. Přicházeli pozdě a byli hluční. Lokalita celkem daleko od nádraží a pěšky po nic moc cestě. 
Možná by bylo super zavést noční klid a hosty vodit potichu s ohledem na ostatní co spí.
Property reply:
Thank you for your feedback. I appreciate the positive comments about the cleanliness and preparation of the room. I'm sorry to hear that the noise from the road. The windows are double glazed and provides quietness when fully closed. I guess it wasn’t closer properly. 

I have added paddings on the door frame and at the bottom for noise reduction and also put a note in all rooms for guests about quiet times. 

I agree that maintaining a quiet environment at night is important for everyone’s comfort, and I will definitely consider this for future stays. I also understand that the location may not be ideal for everyone, especially those on foot. Thank you for your suggestions, and I hope to improve the experience for future guests.

Regards. 
Henry

Review title: Clean and Good value but with some misleading information.
Positive review: Clean and Good value.
Negative review:
I booked this property because the title mentioned free car parking. However, after booking, I received a message stating that parking wasn't guaranteed. I contacted the host, who assured me they would reserve a spot for me. When I arrived, I discovered that the parking space was not a proper designated area but rather on a lawn next to the property. I'm not sure if this was private or public land. Fortunately, I didn't receive a ticket.

Please be aware that although the description states, "The family room features a washing machine, a dining area...well-equipped kitchen..." with corresponding photos under the room details.  It turns out the dining area and the kitchen is actually shared with three other rooms (more than 10 people sharing a small kitchen with a dining table for four?).

One of the reasons I chose a BnB over a hotel was so we could have dinner with our kids on the property. Not wanting to disturb other guests, we ended up going out for dinner instead.
Property reply:
Thank you for your feedback. I appreciate your positive comments on the cleanliness and value of the property.

Regarding the parking, I want to clarify that the parking area on the lawn is part of my property and is used when the other two designated spaces are occupied. Rest assured, it's a safe and commonly used spot by guests.

As for the kitchen and dining area, the listing clearly states that the house is shared with private rooms, meaning the kitchen and dining space are communal. I'm sorry if this wasn't clear, and I understand how this might have impacted your plans.

Your input is valuable, and I will review the listing to ensure all details are as clear as possible for future guests.

Thanks again for staying at mine. 

Kind regards.

Positive review: Great value for money.  House very clean.
Negative review: Room very small , no curtains or blinds.
Property reply: Thank you, Joseph, for your feedback. I'm pleased to hear you found the stay to be great value for money and that you appreciated the cleanliness and comfortable bed. I wanted to clarify that there is a blind in the room, but I apologize if it wasn't immediately noticeable or easy to use. I appreciate your comments and will make sure it is clearly pointed out for future guests. Thanks again for staying with us, and I hope to welcome you back in the future!

Review title: Highly recommended and you will not regret
Positive review:
This is highly recommended stay at Manchester City. All the important landmarks are just a short distance away. I have booked this place as it was just a 10 minutes walking distance away from my exam center in ITTS. 
The place is nice, quiet and you will enjoy staying here with great hospitality from Mr Henry who is always available for any of your queries. The price too is very affordable given the prime location.
Property reply: Thank you so much, Arvind, for your kind words and high recommendation! I'm delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay and found the location convenient for your exam at ITTS. It was a pleasure hosting you, and I’m glad you appreciated the quiet atmosphere and hospitality. Wishing you all the best, and I hope to welcome you back whenever you’re in Manchester again!

Positive review: Comfortable
Property reply: Thank you, Gary! I’m happy to hear you found your stay comfortable. It was a pleasure hosting you, and I hope to welcome you back again!

Positive review: It was spotless
Negative review: Our room was spotless
Property reply: Thank you, Sarah, for your feedback! I’m glad to hear you found the room spotless. Cleanliness is very important to us, and I'm pleased it met your expectations. We hope to welcome you back in the future!

Positive review: Good location. easy to access buses 219. House and bathroom were clean and well maintained. Had use of kitchen , but only coffee was available, no tea. Wifi was good and seamless. Host was staying downstairs. Adequate pillows and sheets provided
Negative review: single room is very small and cramped. Always book double room. Heating was off due to being september, extra blanket was provided.
Property reply:
Thank you for your feedback and for choosing to stay with us. I'm glad to hear that you appreciated our convenient location, cleanliness, and amenities like the Wi-Fi and kitchen access. I apologize for the absence of tea; I will make sure to have it available for future guests.

Regarding the single room size, it is designed as a compact, budget-friendly option for shorter stays. For more space, I always recommend booking the double room, as you mentioned. Concerning the heating, I understand your concern, and I’m glad the extra blanket helped. The heating schedule is set seasonally, but I’m always available to make adjustments for our guests' comfort.

Thank you again for your stay, and I hope to welcome you back in the future!

Review title: This is not luxury, this is someone’s home. Better advertised on Air bnb, shared facilities are doable and clean. Homeow
Negative review: It was cosy, however it is not described very well. I did not expect to be turning up to someone’s house, where not only was there many others staying but the home owner themself at home too. He was polite, TV was on loud and they weren’t dressed for guests. I do not judge them not being dressed for guests in their own home but it was too casual and uncomfortable
Property reply:
Thank you for your feedback. I’m sorry to hear that your experience wasn’t as expected. I strive to provide a welcoming and safe environment for all my guests.

To clarify, the listing does mention that this is a shared space in a home, where other guests and the homeowner may be present. As the host, I am on-site to ensure the comfort, security, and safety of all my guests, especially in maintaining quiet hours and addressing any disturbances promptly.

I apologize if my presence was not what you anticipated, but I’m here to make sure everything goes smoothly. I appreciate your comments and will review the listing description to ensure it is clear for future guests. Thank you again for staying with us.

Positive review:
Henry, the host, was absolutely amazing! Such a kind person, very welcoming, and accommodating to any needs. The house is very clean, very modern and just an absolutely lovely place to stay for two nights. I'd definitely stay again! 

Decent sized kitchen, living area, and the bathroom was so nice, too. Henry mentioned that he is going to install a TV in the single room eventually (which didn't bother me not having one as I don't watch much TV anyway). He is doing some upgrading to one of the other rooms to make it even more perfect, which is exciting.

There is a small dairy (or corner shop) a 4-minute walk away, so easy if you need a snack or a drink. Loved the location - easy walk to the train station (27 minutes), 4-minute Uber to Co-Op Live if you don't want to walk the 30 minutes there. The single room was small, but it was just what I needed! Thank you so much, Henry, for such a lovely stay and for sorting out the other guests who were making a lot of noise. That was really well appreciated :)
Negative review: Just the noise of the guests upstairs on the second night. However, this is down to guest behaviour, nothing to do with the host or the house at all! Henry was very good and asked them to keep it down (as mentioned).
Property reply:
Hi Ashlea,

Wow, thank you so much for your detailed and thoughtful review! I’m really happy you had a great stay and felt welcomed and comfortable throughout. It was a pleasure hosting you, and I appreciate your kind words about the house, upgrades, and location.

I’m also glad the small room suited your needs, and I’ll definitely keep you updated once the TV is installed. I’m sorry again for the noise from other guests, but I’m glad we were able to resolve it quickly.

I look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Best regards,  
Henry

Positive review:
What a fantastic weekend we have just had. Booking was easy and there was contact details available. I messaged the owner asking what was the best way to get o the property and was super helpful and advisd me an uber was quick and the best price. Only £5 in a taxi to Manchester piccadilly train station.
On arrival I was met by the owner shown the kitchen. Clean spacious and has just what you need plus more ! I was in need of a hot drink and there was tea coffee milk etc all there. And a fridge for me to keep my chilled food and my drinks. 
The room was lovely. Bright clean and comfortable. Just what we needed for a.night away. There was plenty of electric plugs and a fan! There was a window for.light and fresh air. The TV had everything signed into so had netflix ready! WiFi was excellent and had already given me the password. Bathroom was shared with 1 other room however we had no issues and we were aware of this when we booked. The owner was very helpful and onsite for any queries  and questions we had. The room door locks for safety and we had a fab night at the coop live which was a 20 minute walk away. There was a chippy on the way aswell. Check in is from2 and check out between 10 and 11 so Fantastic times ! I even managed a nap before the gig.we never heard another person even thos most rooms were books  Will defo be back for our future gigs and shopping. Thank you so much for letting is stay !!
Property reply:
Hi Joanne,

Thank you so much for such a glowing and detailed review! I’m thrilled to hear you had a fantastic weekend and that everything from the booking process to your stay was smooth and enjoyable. It was a pleasure helping you with your arrival and making sure you were comfortable during your visit. I’m glad you found the room and amenities just what you needed, and that the location worked out well for your gig at Co-op Live.

I look forward to welcoming you back for future gigs and shopping trips! Thanks again for choosing to stay with me.

Best regards,  
Henry

Positive review: I had the Double Room with an en-suite. Henry, the Owner, is a lovely man. My Bedroom and Bathroom was spotless. Henry could not do enough for you. You had a Key for the Front Door and there was no restriction on the Time so long as you were quiet which is fair enough. The Location couldn't have been better. Close to Manchester City Centre but far enough away to be very quiet. I Travelled to Manchester by Train. The Bus Stop is right outside the Station and is only around a 5 minute journey with a very frequent Bus Service right up until Midnight. The Etihad and Coop Stadiums are well within walking distance. I stayed for three nights whilst I visited Family and Friends. I would definitely stay here again. Thank you Henry for making my stay enjoyable. I cannot praise you high enough.
Negative review: To be truthful I cannot really think of anything.

Neither the TV nor remote worked correctly. Shower is of low pressure and on the cold side. Host was helpful but had to ask him to switch on the radiator in the middle of the night as the room was freezing!

I’m sorry if there was any misunderstanding or inconvenience. The TV and remote are regularly checked and are in good working order, but I’ll double-check them to ensure they meet expectations. Positive review: Room was spacious.
Negative review: This room was spacious. Only Downside is the absolute terrible host. This host is a very bad person. He greeted us nicely but after it got 9/10 PM it was as if we couldn’t make any noise. Any talk me and my friends had he would come knock on our room and tell us to be quiet, it was really disturbing and actually got us quite frantic. At 12:30 AM he complained again and I kid you not we were simply talking, with a normal tone of voice. How can this be something to complain about? At that stage we had enough and decided to leave. At 1 am Upon talking, packing and leaving he then opened his room door again and shouted ‘do you guys not plan on sleeping’ to which I rudely responded we’re leaving. But this is the thing, so what if we didn’t plan on sleeping? I’ve paid for a room does it mean I have to be in bed and sleep by 11 PM? Why Does this guy have a say on when I should sleep. My friend who was with me said he didn’t even experience this in jail, this was worse than prison in his eyes and this is really telling. Appalling service. Even worse host.
Property reply:
Hi Nazim,

Thank you for your feedback. I’m sorry to hear that your experience did not meet your expectations. However, I’d like to clarify a few points to provide some context. The property is listed as a quiet, comfortable space for guests to rest and is not intended for parties, as stated in the listing.

During your stay, the noise level, loud music, and activities were disturbing other guests. Additionally, smoking, including marijuana, is strictly prohibited on the property for the comfort and safety of all guests. I had to address these issues multiple times to ensure a peaceful environment for everyone.

I understand your frustration, but I have to prioritize the experience of all guests. I hope you can understand the need to maintain a respectful and quiet atmosphere.

Best regards,
Henry
